snippet: Elli Hakami discusses “The Week the Women Went,” a reality series on Lifetime about a week when the women of a South Carolina town left and let the men take care of their families.
abstract: Excerpts from a conversation with Elli Hakami, executive producer of the reality television series The Week the Women Went, which is set to premiere on Lifetime.
lead_paragraph: Elli Hakami discusses “The Week the Women Went,” a reality series on Lifetime about a week when the women of a South Carolina town left and let the men take care of their families.

headline.seo: Elli Hakami on ‘The Week the Women Went,’ on Lifetime
